metadata.title: 0G Developer Course Knowledge Graph
metadata.description: Concept dependency graph for the 0G Developer Course — 25 nodes, 32 typed edges

nodes.label: Architecture Deep Dive
nodes.description: How Chain, Storage, Compute, and DA interconnect

nodes.label: Data Flow Model
nodes.description: Content-addressing, rootHash lifecycle, Merkle proofs

nodes.label: Tokenomics & Gas
nodes.description: Gas fees, storage pricing, compute escrow mechanics

nodes.label: Security Model
nodes.description: Proof of Random Access, TEE verification, ZK proofs

nodes.label: Developer Tooling
nodes.description: SDK, CLI, explorers, and Builder Hub

nodes.label: Storage Architecture
nodes.description: Log layer vs KV layer, erasure coding, data sharding

nodes.label: Log Storage Upload
nodes.description: ZgFile, Merkle tree computation, indexer upload flow

nodes.label: Log Storage Download
nodes.description: Download by rootHash, Merkle proof verification

nodes.label: KV Storage Write
nodes.description: Batcher API, stream IDs, key-value write patterns

nodes.label: KV Storage Read
nodes.description: KvClient, getValue, iteration, consistency model

nodes.label: Storage Production Patterns
nodes.description: Error handling, retry logic, large file chunking

nodes.label: Compute Architecture
nodes.description: Provider marketplace, Compute Ledger, escrow model

nodes.label: OpenAI Migration
nodes.description: 2-line migration from OpenAI to 0G Compute

nodes.label: Provider Management
nodes.description: Discovery, funding, acknowledgement, secret retrieval

nodes.label: Advanced Inference
nodes.description: Streaming, multi-turn, model selection, TEE verification

nodes.label: Fine-Tuning
nodes.description: Custom model training on decentralized GPUs

nodes.label: EVM Deployment
nodes.description: Hardhat/Foundry setup, evmVersion: cancun requirement

nodes.label: Provenance Contracts
nodes.description: Recording rootHashes on-chain, event-driven audit trails

nodes.label: DA Layer Integration
nodes.description: DASigners precompile, data availability for rollups

nodes.label: Rollup Patterns
nodes.description: OP Stack and Arbitrum Nitro integration with 0G DA

nodes.label: Precompile Contracts
nodes.description: DASigners (0x1000), WrappedOGBase (0x1001)

nodes.label: ERC-7857 INFTs
nodes.description: Intelligent NFTs: tokenize AI models with encrypted weights

nodes.label: AI Agent Storage Pattern
nodes.description: Store weights on Storage, infer on Compute, record on Chain

nodes.label: Goldsky Indexing
nodes.description: GraphQL API and database streaming over 0G contract events

nodes.label: Full-Stack Capstone
nodes.description: End-to-end project: Storage + Compute + Chain pipeline
